visualization_prompt: Generate a pie chart showing market share distribution of passenger auto registrations using proportional categorical data representation

point.descriptionFormatter: function(point) { return point.name + ': ' + point.y + '% market share'; }

visualization_explanation: The dataset contains four categorical variables representing vehicle types (EV, Hybrid, Diesel, Petrol) with percentage market shares. Original data from CleanTechnica demonstrates Norway's rapid EV adoption, with synthetic validation showing ∑=100% (±0.1% rounding tolerance). The pie chart maximizes data-ink ratio by eliminating gridlines while maintaining perceptual distinction through carefully spaced hue variations (ΔE > 15 between segments). Cairo's principles are applied through proportional area encoding and redundant color/value encoding. The 75% innerSize creates focal emphasis on largest segment while maintaining relative comparison capability. Statistical validity is ensured through exact source replication (EV=68.1%, Hybrid=11.0%) with diesel-petrol parity demonstrating market phase-out patterns.
